title: Crime over London
creator_credit: Alfred Zeisler, Marcel Hellman and Criterion Ltd
brief_description: A British drama revolving around a store owner who shelters gangsters trying to evade the law. Cast includes Margot Grahame, Paul Cavanagh, Joseph Cawthorn, Basil Sydney and Rene Ray. Written by Norman Alexander and Harold French, based on the novel ‘House of a Thousand Windows’ by Louis De Wohl. Photographed by Victor Armenise and Claude Friese-Greene. Edited by Conrad von Molo.
